DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , non-randomized , open label , longterm safety efficacy follow-up study subject treat bb2121 Phase 1 clinical parent study , evaluate safety efficacy bb2121 subject relapse refractory B cell maturation antigen ( BCMA ) -expressing multiple myeloma . bb2121 define autologous T lymphocyte ( T cell ) transduce ex vivo anti-BCMA02 CAR lentiviral vector encode chimeric antigen receptor ( CAR ) target human BCMA suspend cryopreservative solution . bb2121 administer subject 1 time ( retreat retreatment criterion meet ) parent clinical study . No investigational treatment administer study . After complete parent study , eligible subject follow 15 year last bb2121 infusion parent study .
DOC.brief_title: Longterm Follow-up Subjects Treated With bb2121
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent study subject Were administer bb2121 parent clinical study Able comply study requirement Subject disease progression AND subject undetectable VCN ( < 0.0003 vector copy per diploid genome ) peripheral blood cell 2 consecutive measurement least 1 month apart , least 12 month drug product infusion
